# Problems

Long term use can lead to:


:::{.callout title="Claims from Gary Brecka"}

- Cytotoxicity to synovium dries up the joint, worsens lubrication and leads to more degeneration
- Cytotoxic to fibroblasts and increases ligament laxity
- Impacts folate digestion and results in poor gut health (bloating, gas, pain)

:::
